projectDetails.name: THE ULTIMATE ADDRESS OF LUXURY
projectDetails.description: Welcome to CloutHaus, an address crafted by the elite, for the elite. Join a network of like-minded modern accelerators and witness the synergy of ambitious and influential minds as they redefine KL's landscape with unparalleled elegance. Discover a lifestyle of unparalleled luxury with our exquisitely crafted residences and international branded hotel.

projectDetails.name: THE INSPIRATION OF ‘CLOUTHAUS’
projectDetails.description:
Clout
Clout speaks about a superior influence and reputation. And we believe that every individual is capable of influencing different areas of life in one way or another.
projectDetails.param1:
Haus
‘Haus’ is a German word for a home. Our Haus is a space, a home that encourages chanced encounters with one another, a connected network of like minded individuals. And through this network, a propagation of ideas and experiences are shared and synergised, a tribe of excellence is form.

projectDetails.name: KUALA LUMPUR’S MOST ICONIC ADDRESS
projectDetails.description: Kuala Lumpur, a city shaped by visionaries and innovators, unfolds its majestic story through tales of legacy and pride. From one of the last prime parcels facing the Petronas Twin Towers, CloutHaus rises as a new landmark, a testament to the city’s enduring influence and rich tapestry.

projectDetails.name: INTERNATIONAL BRANDED HOTEL SERVICES
projectDetails.description: CloutHaus, serviced by TA Global’s Paradox Hotel & Resort, embodies Kuala Lumpur’s cultural ethos, inspiring collaboration and conversation. Complemented with an extraordinary mix of world-class amenities and bespoke services, it heralds a new era of luxury living for the privileged few. Paradox spans four countries with six hotels and over 1,350 rooms, crafting incredible memories and stories.
projectDetails.param1: People are not just looking to travel again; they are looking for meaningful emotional connections and memories.

projectDetails.name: ELEVATED FACILITIES FOR LUXURIOUS LIVING
projectDetails.description: At CloutHaus, every facility is meticulously crafted for exclusive, luxurious living. Set against the sweeping panoramas of KLCC and the dynamic cityscape, indulge in the highest 50m infinity pool, relish handcrafted cocktails at the rooftop bar, or refine your physique in the state-of-the-art fitness centre.
